text: Vakhtang Balavadze (Georgian: ვახტანგ ბალავაძე, (November 20, 1927 - July 25, 2018) was a Georgian welterweight freestyle wrestler.Balawadze, Vachtang (URS) . iat.uni-leipzig.de Vakht'ang Balavadze . sports-reference.com He competed at the 1956 and 1960 Summer Olympics and won a bronze medal in 1956. He won the world title in 1954 and 1957, and was a runner-up in 1959. Balavadze died on July 25, 2018 in Tbilisi from a heart attack at the age of 90.Ушёл из жизни бронзовый призёр Игр-1956 по вольной борьбе Балавадзе ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (country) Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet wrestlers
title: Vakhtang Balavadze
